item.title: 加拿大同意美国对墨西哥与中国贸易的担忧
item.description: 加拿大副总理克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）表示，美国对墨西哥贸易政策与其北美盟友在中国问题上不一致的担忧是 "合理的"，她也有同感。【原文：Canadian Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland said American concerns about Mexico’s trade policy not being in line with its North American allies on China are “legitimate,” and she shares them.】

item.title: 霍邱尔计划重启纽约市拥堵收费计划，收费标准为 9 美元
item.description: 纽约州州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）计划恢复对进入曼哈顿大部分地区的司机征收交通拥堵费，几个月前，她曾在开始征收 15 美元交通拥堵费之前突然叫停，认为这会给工薪家庭和小企业造成压力。【原文：New York Governor Kathy Hochul plans to revive congestion pricing for drivers entering large parts of Manhattan, months after abruptly pulling the plug on a $15 charge just before it was set to start, arguing it would have strained working families and small businesses.】

item.title: 里夫斯计划制定法律创建养老金 "巨型基金"，推动英国经济增长
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，随着工党新政府努力兑现其促进私人投资和经济增长的承诺，英国将于明年出台立法，将1.3万亿英镑（1.7万亿美元）的养老金储蓄集中到一系列 "巨型基金 "中。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said the UK will introduce legislation next year to pool £1.3 trillion ($1.7 trillion) of pension savings into a series of “megafunds,” as the new Labour government tries to deliver on its pledge to boost private investment and economic growth.】

item.title: 中国经济预计将在刺激政策后小幅回升
item.description: 中国经济上个月可能获得了增长势头，早期指标显示，在政府于 9 月下旬开始推出刺激措施后，中国经济出现了反弹。【原文：China’s economy likely gained momentum last month, with early indicators pointing to a rebound after the government began rolling out stimulus measures in late September.】

item.title: 大卫-艾因霍恩透露押注农业公司 CNH，股价大涨
item.description: 大卫-艾因霍恩（David Einhorn）透露了在农业设备公司 CNH Industrial NV 的新头寸，该公司股价在纽约下午 4 点 41 分上涨了 7.5%，达到 10.80 美元。【原文：David Einhorn revealed a new position in agriculture equipment company CNH Industrial NV, whose shares rose 7.5% to $10.80 at 4:41 p.m. in New York.】

item.title: 鸡肉需求旺盛，JBS 利润飙升至两年新高
item.description: 全球最大的肉类生产商 JBS SA 正从世界鸡肉消费的增长中获益，鸡肉需求激增，帮助该公司实现了两年来最好的季度利润。【原文：JBS SA, the biggest global meat producer, is reaping the benefits of a world that’s eating more chicken, sending demand surging and helping the company post its best quarterly profits in two years.】

item.title: Nu 股本回报率创历史新高，数字银行业绩超出预期
item.description: Nu Holdings Ltd. 公布的第三季度利润超过了分析师的预期，原因是这家数字银行加快了在拉丁美洲的存款和贷款业务。【原文：Nu Holdings Ltd. posted a third-quarter profit that beat analysts’ estimates as the digital bank accelerated deposits and its lending business in Latin America.】

item.title: 美国指责中国对电信业进行大规模网络间谍活动
item.description: 美国官员周三在一份声明中说，中国国家支持的黑客实施了 "广泛而重大的网络间谍活动"，入侵了多家电信公司，证实了更多有关对国家安全有重大影响的网络攻击的细节。【原文：Chinese state-sponsored hackers perpetrated a “broad and significant cyber-espionage campaign” in which they breached multiple telecommunications companies, US officials said in a statement on Wednesday, confirming additional details about cyberattacks with major national security implications.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜促使澳大利亚养老基金增加私人信贷
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老金和财富管理公司之一 Colonial First State 计划加速推进私人信贷投资，以对冲唐纳德-特朗普潜在的通胀政策。【原文：Colonial First State, one of Australia’s largest pension and wealth managers, plans to accelerate its push into private credit investments to hedge against potential inflationary policies of Donald Trump.】

item.title: 水务行业陷入困境，英国南方水务公司评级被降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）将南方水务有限公司（Southern Water Ltd.）的评级下调至垃圾级，并警告说，鉴于英国自来水和污水处理公司面临的困境以及该公司自身的不良记录，其评级可能会进一步下降。【原文：Southern Water Ltd. was downgraded to junk status by Moody’s Ratings and warned ratings could drop further in light of the woes facing UK water and sewage companies plus the company’s own weak track record.】

item.title: OMV 就 2022 年天然气争端从俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）获得 2.3 亿欧元赔偿金
item.description: OMV AG 表示，该公司从俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）获得了一笔 2.3 亿欧元（2.43 亿美元）外加成本和利息的赔偿金，这笔赔偿金与 2022 年的天然气交付有关，从而提高了利润，并使未来从俄罗斯的采购面临风险。【原文：OMV AG said it has received an award for €230 million ($243 million) plus costs and interest from Gazprom PJSC related to gas deliveries in 2022, boosting profit and risking future procurements from Russia.】

item.title: 刚果与国际货币基金组织就 29 亿美元的新融资达成协议
item.description: 在国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）工作人员同意支持与中非国家合作的两项新贷款计划之后，刚果民主共和国将在未来三年内获得近 29 亿美元的资金。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo is set to receive nearly $2.9 billion in financing over the next three years after International Monetary Fund staff agreed to support two new loan programs with the Central African nation.】

item.title: Element Capital 在大选前持有 20 亿美元的 S&P 500 ETF
item.description: 杰夫-塔尔平斯（Jeff Talpins）的元素资本管理公司（Element Capital Management）在追踪 S&P 500 指数的交易所交易基金中持有股份，到 9 月底价值约 20 亿美元。【原文：Jeff Talpins’ Element Capital Management built a stake in exchange-traded funds tracking the S&P 500 that was worth about $2 billion at the end of September — trades that paid off when Donald Trump recaptured the White House.】

item.title: 因旗下顶级品牌销售额下降，Vans 所有者 VF 被降至垃圾级
item.description: Vans 和其他品牌的所有者 VF Corp. 周三被 S&P Global Ratings 评为垃圾级，原因是其前四大品牌的收入在第二季度持续下降。【原文：VF Corp., the owner of Vans and other brands, was cut to junk by S&P Global Ratings Wednesday as revenues for its top four brands continued falling in the second quarter.】
